m_szDocSumamry: Kia believes hydrogen is the best answer for tomorrow’s cars December 14, 2015 | In: Green Car Industry , Technology Leave a Comment Dr Sae Hoon Kim is the head of environmental research and development for Kia and Hyundai. Just as Elon Musk believes passionately in battery electric cars, Kim believes passionately in hydrogen fuel cell cars. Dr. Kim says Kia will begin producing a fuel cell vehicle built on a dedicated chassis in 2020.
